review: Really like the Fire TV stick. Exceptionally easy to set up and use and the quality of the video is excellent. Makes it easy to get to the right content - also can use apps on your phone to control it - all-in-all a well thought-out design. Programs available on Amazon Prime just keep growing and getting better. A great benefit when combined with Prime shipping, feels like a plus-up!
author: C. Norris "afishionado"

review: I love this product!! Super easy set-up,very user friendly! You can download Netflix and Hulu and stream all your favorite shows. Also a lot of great shows to choose from if you have Amazon Prime. I don't have cable so this is a great low-cost way for me to enjoy great T.V. with many more options!!!
